constraint.name: ca_lineastransferenciasstock_productos
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idproducto) REFERENCES productos (idproducto) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_lineastransferenciasstock_variantes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idvariante) REFERENCES variantes (idvariante) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_lineastransferenciasstock_transferenciasstock
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idtransferhead) REFERENCES transferenciasstock (idtransferhead) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
